Description:
Spacious In and Out
A contemporary new residential neighbourhood, formally the Yorkshire Brewery right in the heart of Collingwood, located in close proximity to East Melbourne, Fitzroy and the CBD, transport, parklands, sporting precincts and an abundance of awesome cafes, bars and restaurants. This as new apartment comprises one bedroom (BIR's), stylish tiled bathroom with laundry facilities, open plan kitchen, meals and living zone which leads out on to a large terrace balcony perfect for relaxing or entertaining friends and family. Other features include SS appliances, timber flooring, split system heating/cooling and secure car park. A safe and well maintained complex with on-site building manager and security surveillance, residents also enjoy the use of the rooftop entertaining lounge area with BBQ facilities, gym, private library, private kitchen and dining room to host your own dinner party and even a furnished apartment for the use of family short stays at a reasonable cost. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction this Thursday 6th April at 6:30pm - Rare Free-Standing Bluestone Terrace
Collingwood at its creative best with a brilliant twist of colonial and contemporary styles, this exceptional double-fronted residence is perfectly located just seconds to Smith and Gertrude Streets' range of cafes, bars and shops. Highlighting a rooftop terrace with views to the city and rear garden with entertainment deck, a stylish quality renovation has transformed this unique freestanding cottage into a smart city-edge sanctuary. Features 2 robed bedrooms, study (possible 3rd bedroom), chic living and dining area (Nectre heater), marble kitchen with Smeg/DeLonghi appliances, stunning bathroom, European laundry, split-system heating/cooling, double-glazed tilt windows, polished concrete and Japanned floors, huge attic storeroom plus ROW. Potential 2nd-level capturing city views (STCA).
Insights: 2-4 Little Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Commercial cool in a class of its own
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - CLOSING TUESDAY 4TH APRIL AT 3:00PM
One of Collingwood's best, this sensational inner-city premise makes an ideal investment or business base with its impressive 3-level design, quality features and abundance of natural light. 5 principal rooms encompassing approx. 222sqm of floor space includes large office and stylish bathroom, stone-top kitchen with integrated fridge and all-Smeg appliances, vast and versatile open spaces for a multitude of uses and applications. Add to this heating and cooling, polished hardwood floors, front balcony and rooftop terrace with city skyline views, plus an enormous 4-car garage (remote-controlled). Smith Street's vibrant cafe and restaurant precinct, Gertrude Street's boutique shops and public transport options are all close by as well as impressively close proximity to the CBD.
Note: Commercial 2 Zoning.
Insights: 17 Waterloo Road, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Vast & versatile conversion, vibrant city-fringe locale
Step up in style, space and stature with this sensational warehouse conversion located at the heart of Collingwood's dynamic fashion and arts precinct.
A cleverly conceived fit-out has created a perfectly adaptable layout over 2 levels that's immediately ready to work in with your city-edge lifestyle.
Including 2 car spaces on title plus large north-side courtyard with extra OSP; high industrial ceilings, polished concrete floors and enormous light-capturing windows frame a flexible interior featuring divided open-plan upstairs zone plus ground-floor area with library, 3 versatile rooms and quality marble kitchen.
Also offers 2.5 bathrooms, kitchenette, laundry, hydronic heating, A/C and storage. Moments to Gertrude St, Fitzroy Gardens, trains, trams and CBD.
Note: Commercial 2 Zone.
Insights: 1/9 Byron Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
A genuine warehouse apartment!
This authentic warehouse apartment offers style, space and sophistication. Industrial edged but offering creature comforts - the home successfully blends contemporary appointments into a wonderful warehouse tapestry. Lofty ceilings, exposed brickwork, original beams, polished floorboards and large timber windows make it a warehouse space to enjoy all year round. Large open plan living/ dining with well appointed kitchen, 2 generous bedrooms, stylish bathroom with European laundry and loads of internal storage. The complete inner city package so close to vibrant Smith and Gertrude Street and so much more.
Insights: 2/136 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern living redefined
Architectural flair, designer style and modern opulence highlight the key features of this boutique, light-filled new townhouse (1 of only 3) delivering an executive lifestyle of absolute quality, class and inner-city ease. Meticulous attention to detail, the home's stunning interior boasts 2 double bedrooms (master with WIR), luxurious ensuite, main bathroom and guest powder room (third WC). Add to this a Bosch-equipped gourmet kitchen and light-filled open-plan living/dining area leading out to a north-facing entertainers' terrace. Other features include heating and cooling, polished concrete and hardwood floors, custom cabinetry and solar hot water, plus video intercom/secure entry and remote-controlled internal-access garage. Moments from Smith Street trams and shops, cool cafes and renowned restaurants.
Insights: 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Bold, Contemporary Classic - ready to be enjoyed!
This architectural showpiece, by Chaney Architecture, offers the very best inner-city lifestyle you could hope for in one of Melbourne's most desirable locations. With everything on your doorstep including cutting edge cafes and restaurants, a vast array of retail options and literally metres from public transport, life couldn't be more convenient.
Enjoying a floorplan that really works, the open plan living and dining flows seamlessly to a north facing courtyard via bi-fold doors and is made for entertaining. A super generous kitchen with natural stone benchtops is ready for 5-star cooking and will further compliment the entertaining that will be the focal point of this house.
Generously proportioned throughout, the home has been designed to suit a number of potential buyers and offers three well-sized bedrooms, main with ensuite, second with city views and a third which occupies the entire top floor, all featuring industrial style windows, flooding the home with plenty of natural light, plus a second bathroom and powder room. Off street parking is available via a rear lane.
Your search stops here as this home ticks all of the boxes for inner-city living.
Scott McElroy : 0411 889 972
Insights: 24 Mater Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Iconic Building - Ideal Location!
Located within the iconic Foy & Gibson Woollen Mills this ground floor warehouse apartment is sure to please.
A gorgeous blend of new and old the apartment features open plan living with modern kitchen, SMEG appliances and combined dining/ lounge leading to a private terrace.
One large bedroom with built in robes and sliding door to an additional balcony/terrace and central bathroom with euro laundry.
Just footsteps to your morning coffee at the famed Proud Mary and Smith & Gertrude Street's eclectic mix of boutiques, bars and restaurants and the 86 tram to the CBD.
Secure basement car space, intercom entry and storage cage complete the package.
A perfect first home, city base or investment
- This is one you won't want to miss.
Anton Wongtrakun : 0419 352 888

Description:
Italianate elegance, prime address
'Sophia Terrace': this historically significant residence, constructed by the master plasterer Henry Adamson in 1876, fuses period character with tasteful modern improvements. Seconds from the Gertrude Street arts precinct, Smith Street cafes and transport, the home features Adamson's exquisite plaster ceilings, Baltic floors and open fireplaces, and includes gas heating, split-system air conditioning and generous storage. Its versatile floor plan offers three double bedrooms, a gracious sitting room, dining room/4th BR, solid timber kitchen with premium appliances, powder room and 2 bathrooms, one with laundry facilities. With a secluded courtyard for al fresco entertaining, this captivating residence on the East Melbourne border represents CBD living at its finest!
Insights: 3 Derby Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Indoor-Outdoor Style, Quality & Seclusion
Superbly oriented to capture abundant northern light, this outstanding double-storey residence offers excellent modern living and sensational entertaining in a secluded landscaped setting with secure off-street parking. Come on in to an exciting city-fringe cafe, culinary and cultural precinct and love the living with this quietly positioned terrace home brilliantly balancing contemporary style and fabulous quality throughout an impressive layout. Features three bedrooms with built-in robes (main includes ensuite), fitted study area, spacious open-plan living and dining, fully-appointed kitchen, two bathrooms (freestanding bath), separate WC, laundry, ironing centre, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, alarm system, polished Bamboo floorboards, plantation shutters, great storage and bifold doors to a stunning covered entertainment deck and garden.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
Huge Sun-Soaked Northerly Garden Terrace
Large open-plan living spaces flowing to a huge sun-soaked entertaining terrace are the hallmark features of this north-facing 'one bedroom plus study' contemporary apartment idyllically located to thriving Smith Street and popular Gertrude Street cafes and restaurants. Stylish interiors include a sleek stone-finished galley-style kitchen with dishwasher (stainless steel appliances), large robed bedroom, open study, bathroom with laundry facilities; while spectacular views from air-conditioned living areas amplify space and comfort. The huge garden terrace is a rare commodity and just the spot for family get-togethers and year-round entertaining. Eminently appealing to first home buyers or savvy investors, this light-flooded abode also boasts a basement car-space, storage cage, lift access, security entrance foyer, and perfect proximity to public transport and Melbourne's CBD.
Josh Burne : 0430 338 202

Description:
Modern-edge style, city-fringe envy
Secure surrounds, designer style and plenty of natural northerly light sum up the key features of this brilliant first-floor apartment in a boutique block (only 30 apartments), situated in a prime Fitzroy-edge location moments from Smith Street cafe culture and city-bound trams. First-class interior comprises one double bedroom (with mirrored robes), chic bathroom and open-plan living/dining area leading out to a north-facing fully-undercover terrace. Add to this a stone-top kitchen with dishwasher and Blanco/Qasair cooking appliances, Euro laundry, Daikin split-system heating and cooling and timber floors, plus lift access to secure entry foyer, lower-level car space and large storage cage. Exceptional inner-city living or blue-chip investing - it's a perfect choice either way!
Insights: 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
North Facing Entertainers Courtyard
Wonderful opportunity, to secure your foothold, into one of Melbourne’s most desirable suburbs.
Boasting a Huge 10m x 3.5m outdoor area, which would most certainly put others to shame.
This modern residence, showcases an open plan living/dining room, 2 bedrooms (1 with WIR and the other with BIR), kitchen with granite bench tops, Bosch stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and central bathroom.
Featuring security entrance, convenient lift access to its first floor position, split system cooling/heating, car space and very handy storage cage.
Fantastic location, close to Smith and Gertrude Street’s Arts/Dining Precinct, cool bars, cafes and parkland.

Description:
Just imagine the possibilities!
With its classic Victorian features, generous land size and 3 street frontages, this semi-detached brick terrace offers a world of opportunities to revive, expand or possibly develop (STCA) in one of inner-Melbourne's premier pockets. Past its prime yet full of character, the home's current floorplan comprises 2 double bedrooms and functional bathroom, central lounge and adjoining kitchen, plus a private north-facing rear courtyard complete with ROW access. A rare offering in this ultra-convenient location close to Victoria Park Station and Hoddle Street buses, easy access to Smith Street trams, cafes and restaurants. Unleash your imagination!

Description:
Designer style and architectural finesse
Characterised by its timeless period attributes, stunning renovations and impressive two-level extension, this Victorian showpiece delivers a lifestyle of absolute quality, versatility and city-edge practicality. Meticulous attention to detail, the home's vogue interior boasts 3 bedrooms (upstairs master with ensuite) and mezzanine study, deluxe main bathroom, open-plan living/dining area with bi-folds revealing a private courtyard including entertainers' deck, lawn area and perimeter gardens. Add to this a gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops/breakfast bar and European appliances, hydronic heating and split-system a/c, solar power, polished concrete and Tallowwood timber floors. Close to Hoddle Street buses and Victoria Park Station, shops and supermarkets, boutique bars, cafes and restaurants.

Description:
"Inner City Delight"
Near new, this development by prominent Melbourne property developer Urban Inc and designed by award winning architects Elenberg Fraser located in the heart of Collingwood's Foy and Gibson heritage precinct.
This spacious 2 bedroom apartment in the Tailor building comes equipped with stainless steel appliances, double glazed windows, a master bedroom with WIR / en-suite, second bedroom with built-in wardrobes, split system heating and cooling, open living areas, 1 secure car space and storage cage.
Beyond the apartment, the lush exterior landscapes provide occupants with a secure sanctuary to call home. With plenty of options for entertaining whether it be by the rooftop garden terrace or swimming pool which overlooks Collingwood's decommissioned industrial factories.
Less than 4km from the CBD and even closer proximity to Smith Street bars/cafes/restaurants, Oxley is conveniently located to provide an ideal balance of work and play.
This is an opportunity you can't miss!

Description:
Your own sun-drenched corner of city-edge paradise
An extensive wrap-around terrace is perfectly private and complemented by the stylish, single-level space of this delightful light-filled warehouse apartment. Secluded and secure in the vibrant Foy & Gibson precinct, this smart 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in a boutique block with lift enjoys an elevated sun-drenched corner position just seconds to the restaurants, bars and boutiques of Smith & Gertrude Streets. An impressive owner-occupier or investor opportunity of minimal maintenance featuring main bedroom with ensuite, living and dining room with northerly floor-to-ceiling windows, fully-appointed kitchen, laundry, reverse-cycle heating/cooling and basement car space on title.
Insights: 4/170 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 18 other 3 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian Elegance, Modern Brilliance
Light-filled and luxurious, this freestanding period showpiece presents an environment of energy-efficient style and substance with its stunning architect-designed extension and exclusive city-edge location. Spacious and versatile, the home's divine interior boasts 2 large bedrooms (both with robes), dedicated study and deluxe central bathroom. Add to this a gourmet stone-top kitchen with Bosch appliances, open living/dining area leading out to a private courtyard with decking, BBQ gas point and workshop/storage shed. Features include low e glass and extensive natural ventilation, feature zinc wall, concrete bench and internal/external speaker system, plus ducted heating throughout, alarm system, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Set on an impressively wide block (8m+ frontage), it's close to Smith Street, Hoddle Street buses and Victoria Park Station, popular cafes, pubs, restaurants and shopping precincts. Land 231sqm approx.
Insights: 93 Hotham Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Innovative design: an inner city oasis
A creative collaboration between renowned ITN Architects and its owner-builder has produced this stunning residence, oriented for light and leafy views and centred around a tranquil landscaped courtyard garden with water feature and wood block paving. With subtle timber textures, polished concrete floors and large areas of glass, it comprises a high-ceilinged living/dining room open to a kitchen with bespoke cabinetry and Bosch appliances; 2 double bedrooms flowing to terrace with northerly views, master with striking indoor/outdoor ensuite; sleek main bathroom with walk-in shower; euro laundry and internal-entry garage. Close to Smith St cafes and transport, this style-leading residence offers maximum privacy and features custom storage, double-glazing, ducted air conditioning, hydronic heating, solar HWS and security system. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 65B Hotham Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Light and luxury over 2 levels
An exclusive domain with the best of inner-Melbourne at your fingertips, this sensational ground-level townhouse delivers a spacious environment of quality and class with its creative floorplan, fine features and abundance of natural light. Designer interior boasts 2 upstairs bedrooms (both with robes), deluxe bathroom and additional powder room, vast open-plan living/dining spaces complemented by a stone-top kitchen with Smeg cooking appliances and integrated dishwasher. Add to this split-system a/c and Nobo panel heaters, high ceilings, polished concrete floors, LED lighting, full-size laundry, plus intercom/secure entry foyer, lower-level parking space and storage cage. In Collingwood's prized Foy & Gibson precinct, Smith Street trams, cafe culture and renowned restaurants, shops and supermarkets are all close by.
Insights: 6/78 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Ultra-spacious, secure with CBD views
Offering low-maintenance executive living over approximately 195m2, this multi-level town residence at 'Islington Town Houses' has the special attractions of a private lawned garden, roof terrace, double garage and security entry. Exclusively positioned bordering East Melbourne and close to the MCG, hip cafes and bars, it comprises a versatile floor plan with large lower-level office/4th BR, 3 double bedrooms (ensuite and WIR to main), expansive timber-floored living/ dining room open to Blanco-fitted kitchen and north-facing entertaining balcony, stylish main bathroom and separate laundry. Features of this exceptionally secure and secluded residence include ducted heating/cooling, video intercom and generous storage.
Insights: 15/18-22 Islington Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.
